item.title: About This Project
item.description: @SketchTheDocs is a project to explore visual storytelling as a tool to learn, and teach, complex technology concepts. I’m motivated by two stats: 65% of humans are visual learners. We absorb information by sight, detecting patterns and making connections that can improve our retention and recall of what we learn. One third of students are visual-spatial learners. We think in pictures, and can learn better when we see “the big picture” (concept or workflow) before we dive into the details.
